prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a bright orange body and playful antennae.
I want a small Pokemon that resembles a musical instrument and has a round shape.
Generate a tiny creature that loves to hide in grassy areas and has a cheerful look.
Make a Pokemon with a unique sound ability and a body shaped like a little beetle.
Imagine a Pokemon with large round eyes and a friendly smile, perfect for a family-friendly game.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has vibrant colors to blend in with nature.
Show me a critter-like Pokemon that has a whimsical design and a joyful personality.
